mapper.select: SELECT TOP #{batchQueueCount} * FROM t_event_queue_API t WHERE t.event_name = #{eventName} AND t.event_type = #{eventType} AND ( (t.status = 'NEW' AND t.date_finished IS NULL) OR (t.status = 'ERROR' AND t.retry_count < #{retryCount}) OR (t.status = 'START' AND DATEDIFF(minute, t.date_started, GETDATE()) > #{timeoutRetryMinute}) OR (t.status IN ('MAIL','ERROR') AND DATEDIFF(minute, t.date_started, GETDATE()) > #{timeoutRetryMinute}) AND (t.error_msg LIKE '%Timeout%' OR t.error_msg LIKE '%deadlocked%') ) ORDER BY t.fifo_sequence
mapper.update: UPDATE t_event_queue_API t SET t.date_started = GETDATE(), t.status = 'START' WHERE t.fifo_sequence = #{fifoSequence}
UPDATE t_event_queue_API t SET t.date_finished = GETDATE(), t.status = 'DONE' WHERE t.fifo_sequence = #{fifoSequence}
